subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Keith Cothran and Lamonte Ulmer each scored 15 points  to help Rhode Island defeat visiting St. Joseph’s in the opening round of the Atlantic 10 Conference tournament.
snippet: Keith Cothran and Lamonte Ulmer each scored 15 points  to help Rhode Island defeat visiting St. Joseph’s in the opening round of the Atlantic 10 Conference tournament.
